title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Skills: Context-Based Peace and Citizenship Education: Elementary Teacher Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners Can Design Two or More Mathematics-Based Projects Reflecting Core Principles of Peace Education (Conflict Resolution, Respect for Diversity) (e.g., Fair Distribution Algorithm Design) Within Six Months and Submit Outputs Meeting at Least Four of Five Evaluation Criteria from Peer Reviews and Expert Examinations
Development of at least two peace education scenarios reflecting community issues through context-based learning design.
Completion of over 90% of project deliverables and fulfillment of evaluation criteria through peer feedback and expert coaching.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
